title: 怎么用/give的指令更改物品的lore及名字
author: MC_Shenfeng
txt_content: 问题看标题大家来讨论~

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
用/give修改lore？我没看错吧，/give可以修改lore？
另：你说的指令应该是这样的：
/give @p minecraft:redstone 1 0 {display:{Name:"嘿嘿嘿",Lore:["红红火火恍恍惚惚"]}}复制代码

replies.author: MC_Shenfeng
replies.txt_content: 服务器里面/give 名字 比如276 1 lore:2333就会有钻石剑下面2333的字的

replies.author: what_name
replies.txt_content: give @p dye 1 3 {display:{Name:"Shit",Lore:["哈哈哈","哈哈哈","哈哈哈"]}}复制代码

replies.author: qyhaotime
replies.txt_content: give Id 物品 数量 nbt
